scenariodescription: The robot, a delivery bot, is tasked with transporting a box from one side of the warehouse to the other. The scenario takes place in the central part of the warehouse. The robot starts from the east passageway (node e3) and needs to transport the box to the west passageway (node 11). As the robot takes a turn at a blind corner (node 99 to node d9), it encounters a human (Human 1). Human 1 does not notice the robot until it is very close (within 1.5 meters) and stops completely until the robot is no longer blocking their path. The robot then continues its journey to the destination.
